sense.name: foretell, make a prediction
sense.examples: Club Med predicts a rise in net profit. Who correctly predicted the outcome of the election? I predict that more bloggers will write about this than traditional media pundits. Some claim that Nostradamus predicted the Challenger space shuttle disaster. These similar dependences of the parameters have led us to predict that the cause is the same. For example, I can predict that any heavy object dropped from a table will fall to the ground. Students should be able to predict that the answer is a type of wild animal.
